editor.qr_code_explanation:
The QR codes you add to your presentations are by default linked with the homepage. As soon as you share them, their content will automatically be updated with their online urls.

Alternatively, you could also provide a custom url for their content.

offline.why: Low bandwidth? Have to jump in a plane? Or want to present without internet connections?
